name: Level 1 The Gate of Trials
description: You're at the entrance of the dungeon, Collect all 3 statues to open the door to the holy grail

name: Armory
description: You found a sword, which boosts your attack power by 15 HP.

name: Potion Room
description: You find a room filled with various potions that could aid you in your journey

name: Key Room
description: You come across a room with a shiny key on a pedestal. However, as soon as you grab it, the room starts filling with poisonous gas!

name: Riddle Room
description: You enter a room filled with riddles, but beware, each wrong answer triggers a trap!

name: Boss Room
description: Congratulations! You've reached the final challenge. A fierce Chimera stands between you and a piece of the holy grail. Defeat it to claim your prize!
